name: AddsYou
overview:
AddsYou.com is a social publishing network that pays authors for their written works.

This compilation of novels, shorts stories, poems, screenplays, etc. is positioned to become the worldâ€™s largest database of knowledge. Characterized as the Ultimate Publishing Platformâ„¢, AddsYou redefines the way people publish and share knowledge on the internet, without the limitations of a blog, forum or wiki. Adds You is the evolution of online knowledge-based sharing and publishing. It is unencumbered by the limitations of a blog, forum or wiki. By combining a free and easy-to-use publishing platform with helpful tools, such as personal and shared collections to manage and sort publishings, an importer to transfer blog postings, and a license and copyright manager, AddsYou is the one stop shop for publishing, marketing and monetizing content on the web.
